org.openhab.binding.lcnserial.internal.handler

Class LCNPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcnserial.internal.handler.LCNPort

  • public class LCNPort
extends java.lang.Object
    The LCNPort class handles the communication with the LCN-Bus. It can send, receive and interpret bus-telegrams
    Author:
    Thomas Fischer

      • ReadBytes

        public int ReadBytes(char[] cmdChar,
                     int len)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Reads an amount of bytes from the LCN-Bus Java has no unsigned byte type. So we have to use char's myPort.readBytes() seems not be synchronous - it seems, it comes also back with a timeout So we wait until the InputBuffer is filled...
        Parameters:
        cmdChar - Output Array
        len - Amount of bytes to be read
        Returns:
        Length of read-bytes
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException - IOException
